name: HexaHover
description:
Drive a glowing hovercraft bumper car around a quickly changing hexagonal playing field and be the last one standing to be victorious!

Best played with 2+ controllers!

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 38 game jam.

Vote here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/hexahover
